attributes.action: full life sentance for child sex/crullty/murder, even if first offence
attributes.additional_details: As a human being and a parent i am sick of hearing of these sick scum releast from jails,even a first offence throw away the key , max sentance and life mean life , this is a sick and in human offence and should be dealt with . they are not ill or need help or care, they are scum and should not be allowed to be in sociaty ,  disclose there where abouts and let a vigilante do what any usless goverment refuse to
